name: <color_light_blue>Really Dark Skies</color>
description: A supplement mod that increments the Cataclysm Bright Nights experience by adding an inscrutable evil, extra-terrestrial humanoid paramilitary expeditionary force to your typical survival scenario. /n/n Complements to the vanilla adding the evil aliens 'The Xenoids', a regenerating, alternative style of zombies called 'Strays', and terrifyingly armored [REDACTED], and even expansions to old foes like Mi-Go's, and Triffids!  <color_light_red>Prepare for a challenge.</color>
